website_summaries.verdict: An invisible fence that's easy to set up, suitable for large dogs and can expand for multi-dog homes.
pros: Very reliable with 5 levels of correction
Initial kit features 1/3 acre coverage for one dog, but can expand to work across one acre with many dogs
Works with pets of any size and age
cons: Expanding the system will up the price tag

customer_reviews.title: High quality for price. easy use
customer_reviews.text: I have an Australian Sheppard puppy, and he needs a lot of room to play. We only have 2/3 of an acre, but this fence was perfect. Once he was trained for the fence it worked very well for him. Training is a MUST though. Very easy to use and charge collar. The line works well all the way around and always vibrates before shocking.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Ann

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th or 5th collar I have purchased over the last 12 years. (Other brands I have used no longer make the system I originally had). This was pretty inexpensive so I was apprehensive but my dog is almost 13 so I really needed it as a reminder for those days senility kicked in and she forgot her boundaries. So far has worked well. Beeps and vibrates as a warning which is what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Walker55

customer_reviews.title: Traumatized dog
customer_reviews.text: The level 2 setting traumatized by year and a half old English Springer Spaniel. He would not go outside with the collar on after the first time and if I made him his entire body shook in fear. Ended up returning. I highly recommend beginning with the level 1 setting no matter what kind or size of dog you have. May also want to put collar on a few days without turning it on so the dog doesn't associate the correction with the collar. good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Great Training Device
customer_reviews.text: My dog trained easily in about 3 days, stays in his own yard now, no worries about him chasing a car to get run over. We do unplug system when storming (as a precaution). They need to make a smaller transmitter for smaller dogs, seems a little much for 6 lb dog. But it works.
customer_reviews.author: JoDee Nurse

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Upon receipt of Free Spirit Dog Fence, I found that the charger cable could not be inserted into the receiver collar as the center pin in the charger port was bent. I ordered a replacement Free Spirit Dog Fence & found that it had the same problem. This problem is not due to damage but rather a manufacturing defect. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ROB675

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy
customer_reviews.text: System was hard to install and it stopped working after 10 minutes. Waste of money :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works if you do the work with your dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced wire with a better quality 18 gage wire and buried it with a rented cable installer from Home Depot, took about an hour to do 1⁄4 of an acre. Collars work great, we worked with our dogs for about a week and have had no problems. One of the collars stoped working after about 18 months and I contacted customer service. They replaced it for free even though it was out of warranty. I recommend adding a surge protector to protect the transmitter. Great customer service and great little product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: shelly holland

customer_reviews.title: No doc
customer_reviews.text: Got the package, very well wrapped, found all the pieces but no manual! That's why just three stars. I plugged it into the USB charger and got an orange light. NO IDEA what that means. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: RHM

customer_reviews.title: Great system
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about a cheaper system, but it's all I could spare the money for. I have 7 dogs on this system, 4 ACDs, a boarder collie/bluetick mix, a jack/rat terrier and a chihuahua. It's very effective and I dont have to worry about letting them out unsupervised after the initial training!
customer_reviews.author: Aiden Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: As Described! A+
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great fence thus far....took my 7 month old German Boxer 1 week to know the boundary...Works as Described...Inow my dog can run free in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Works great and priced right, especially the additional collars. My pit mastiffs are very intelligent and have mastered snapping the collars off and then hiding them. Hopefully we'll soon figure out a solution but until then we will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: MsHunnieBrown

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! AMAZING battery life!
customer_reviews.text: Love this system! We already had a wire in the ground from a previous system that had given out and this system connected right away and worked like a charm! The battery life on the collar is AMAZING! Charged it before using and and haven't had to charge it again for a good 2 1/2 months! So impressed with this system! Many others have let us down
customer_reviews.author: Pheobe Wagler

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to setup and understand. Great battery life
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: the charging hook up is fragile
customer_reviews.text: this is a great training/containment device but the plugs to charge things are extremely fragile and the wire that comes with it isn't large enough
customer_reviews.author: William Croft

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Item is easy to use and I would recommend it for anyone trying to keep their dog inside the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Pitcher

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: This collar only worked for one week and quit! Don’t buy this product! That was the second one we bought both worked for weeks only!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Clips are cheap
customer_reviews.text: Clips on the sides are not very sturdy. Thus why I have to keep purchasing new ones as when my doggies play they break. Last about 6 ish months
customer_reviews.author: Jon link

customer_reviews.title: Collar
customer_reviews.text: Used daily, reliable, dog doesn't notice it is on him
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Buy a free spirit pet products for dummies before you buy
customer_reviews.text: I can not get this to sync with any system, Including the free spirit brand. Waste of my money. It came wrapped but with no instructions. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price. Does exactly what it’s supposed too. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Bonsie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plugged the existing wire into it and it works. Hard to ask for more than that.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lux

customer_reviews.title: Ur dog will be traumatized if not used correctly
customer_reviews.text: Works great just make sure ur dogs not wearing the collar whn ur lowering the setting it will shock him as ur doing it my dog was crying loudly
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Signal is too low
customer_reviews.text: Hello, this device is not working, I appreciate if you can help me. The signal is too low.Also, I uploaded video here.
customer_reviews.author: Davit Maisuradze

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Has worked like it should so far. The wire is a pain to bury, but that will be any underground fence.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding value! Had 2 months and battery still hasn't needed a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Orr

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I trained my dog and it worked for 5 months then stopped working. My dog tests her boundaries and without the audible reminder it is worthless. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis

customer_reviews.title: This was the best buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a life-saver! My dog kept getting into my garden and digging everything up and I was at my wits end! This is worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: norma.mendiola21

customer_reviews.title: Didn't keep
customer_reviews.text: I can not review this item, bc I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Smith

customer_reviews.title: For the canine who thinks the grass is greener on the other side
customer_reviews.text: Having trained dogs using other methods, like Monks of New Skete, this invisible fence is helpful at teaching your four legged friend where the boundary is and where not to go. The tone and vibration is probably all most people will need to use after an initial low jolt. Well built and easy to follow instructions that includes plenty of wire and markers for the typical size yard. I highly recommend this system as a supplement to positive reinforcement training methods.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Free Spirit In Ground Fencing
customer_reviews.text: This was not too difficult to install except for the part across the driveway. I checked with the manufacturer and they let me know that the signal would travel through concrete, unless there was a lot of metal (rebar) in it. I ended up putting it into a seam and covering it with concrete. So far it works like it should. I do check the collar batteries every few days to make sure my dog is going to stay!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: I would also recommend not exciding 500’ for your barrier
customer_reviews.text: This unit does work and has been effective with trial and error. The weak area I experienced was that this system is lacking the boundary range it stated. I had to make a few adjustments to achieve a safe boundary that prevented my dogs from crossing. This required a loop that had an 8’ spacing between the lines. I would also recommend not exciding 500’ for your barrier. Outside of that the rechargeable collar is great.
customer_reviews.author: American Dad

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good, my city does not allow me to install a taller fence in my front yard so I am always concerned with my dog jumping the fence. I installed this only in my front yard a few feet away from the fence line and my girl does not go near the front fence but can run free through the rest of the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. ChaCha

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good one
customer_reviews.text: We have two dogs that have been trained on various types of border control functions. This is a pretty good one. The installation took about an hour (I wanted to get it right) and the results have been generally positive. It requires positive training and reinforcement. Good, well made, and definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: AusE

customer_reviews.title: My dog leaves as she pleases.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute waste of money! My 20lbs short haired dog runs through the boundary like it’s not even there. The collar is set to the maximum shock level, the boundary at the widest, and everything tests properly. This system is a joke! Save your money and install a real fence if you need to contain your dog.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher E

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to set up and works well. It covers smaller areas than its competitors but for a fraction of the price. It works well even after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Darlaina Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our 1/3 acre! I love the rechargeable collar!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler K

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This underground fence was fairly easy to set up initially. It took a while for my dog to get used to his boundaries.
customer_reviews.author: Lawtooth

product_meta.title: Free Spirit In-Ground Fence - Underground Wire Dog Containment System - Waterproof, Rechargeable Collar with Tone/Vibrate and Shock - Keep Your Pets in Your Yard with this Custom DIY Boundary Kit
product_meta.description: Style:In-Ground Fence KitThe Free Spirit In-Ground Fence allows you to customize a yard boundary for your pet. A radio signal travels from the transmitter through a buried wire, marking the boundaries you wish to set for your dog. Your dog wears a collar that detects the signal in the buried wire. As your dog approaches the boundary wire, the collar will beep and vibrate when entering the warning zone. If he proceeds further, he receives a harmless but unpleasant shock to contain him in the area that you have established. The Free Spirit In-Ground Fence can be used with pets over 5 lb.
feature_bullets: EXPANDABLE UP TO 1 ACRE WITH UNLIMITED DOGS: This kit contains 1 dog in 1/3 acre but can be expanded to contain an unlimited number of dogs in up to 1 acre with additional purchases

TONE, VIBRATION AND 5 LEVELS OF CORRECTION: The collar emits a warning tone and vibration when your dog approaches the wire. If your dog continues, the collar will deliver the shock level you select to deter more steps forward
WATERPROOF AND RECHARGEABLE: Whether it's raining or your dog enjoys puddles, this humane, rechargeable training device will perform safely
FITS ALL DOGS 5 LB. AND UP: Whether you have a small, medium, large or giant-sized dog, this adjustable collar works for all dogs 5 lb. and up with neck sizes 6 in. to 26 in.
EASY TO FIT: Simply adjust the strap to your dog's neck, ensuring the contact points touch skin; to avoid discomfort or damage to your dog's skin, it should not be worn more than 12 hours a day

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
